New Records: Josh Inglis scored 103 off 49 balls in the second T20 match against Scotland
Key Match Events: Josh Inglis and Marcus Stoinis were the stars of the match for Australia
Scotland subsided to 126 all out despite a blistering start by George Munsey
Travis Head and Mitch Marsh smashed the powerplay record in the T20 win over Scotland
Pre-Game Insights: Australia captain Mitchell Marsh lost the toss and Richie Berrington inserted the tourists
Post-Match Reflections: Mitchell Marsh praised Josh Inglis's all-round performance and said it was a really good game of cricket
Australia have a chance to win 3-0 and tomorrow is another opportunity
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in foggy conditions which delayed the start by 30 minutes
Six Australian bowlers took at least one wicket as the Scots subsided to 126 all out
Others: The final match of the three-match series is in Edinburgh on Saturday
